books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The government hitman Will Robie uncovers a serious threat as he attempts to take out a fellow assassin who has gone rogue.
books.name: THE HIT

books.author: by J. Kenner
books.description: Nikki Fairchild yearns to know the secrets of the powerful multimillionaire Damien Stark, and their troubled pasts will either bind them close or shatter them completely. A sequel to “Release Me.”
books.name: CLAIM ME

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: A woman must deal with her personal issues before she will be able to keep her promise to help the family of her deceased friend.
books.name: FLY AWAY

books.author: by H. M. Ward
books.description: A young woman goes to bed with a sexy man, but complications ensue. The first in a series.
books.name: DAMAGED

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A former criminal attorney who has been acquitted of his wife’s murder retreats to his family estate on a rocky New England cliff, where he is comforted by the house’s caretaker amid continuing danger.
books.name: WHISKEY BEACH

books.author: by Abbi Glines
books.description: For Woods Kerrington, the carefree girl who didn’t care what the world thought of her was more breakable than he could ever imagine.
books.name: TWISTED PERFECTION

books.author: by Rachel Van Dyken
books.description: Jake, a Seattle millionaire, asks his formerly estranged childhood friend Kacey to pretend to be engaged to him. But she reckoned without Jake’s brother, Travis.
books.name: THE BET

books.author: by Sophie Kinsella
books.description: A woman tries to break up her sister’s impulsive marriage.
books.name: WEDDING NIGHT

books.author: by Amanda Quick
books.description: The second book of a new Victorian paranormal series, Ladies of Lantern Street, by Jayne Ann Krentz, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE MYSTERY WOMAN

books.author: by Katy Evans
books.description: Remington Tate, the star of the dangerous underground fighting circuit, sets a woman’s mind ablaze and her body on fire with wanting.
books.name: REAL

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Six years after the woman he loved married another man, Jake Fisher discovers that neither she nor their life together were what theyseemed, and he sets out to uncover the truth.
books.name: SIX YEARS

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: Two sisters are threatened by a dark secret from their family’s past.
books.name: DADDY'S GONE A HUNTING

books.author: by Edward Rutherfurd
books.description: Characters real and imaginary meet in a historic portrait of the City of Light across the centuries.
books.name: PARIS

books.author: by Kathy Reichs
books.description: The forensic anthropologist Temperance Brennan pursues a case involving infanticide, murder and corruption; the 15th novel in the series behind the show “Bones.”
books.name: BONES ARE FOREVER
